title: SKS Explorer frame bags add a fender, waterproof construction for all-weather adventures
content:
Yeah, we know, a giant bikepacking saddle bag kinda acts like it’s own fender. But when you need to pull that bag inside your tent or hotel and it’s covered in mud, that dual purpose functionality loses a little luster. Enter the new SKS Explorer series of bikepacking bags. Starting at the back, the Explorer

author: Tyler Benedict
